title: #118 Language
itunes:title: #118 Language
description:
This week the topic is language so the guys delve into offensive language, sign language, the 5 love languages, speaking Klingon at a bar and how eight buffaloes can make one grammatically correct sentence. 

 

 

Podcast produced by Nate & Laura Bargatze

Recording & Editing by Genovations Media

https://www.natebargatze.com

https://www.allthingscomedy.com

https://www.genovationsmedia.com

Email - Nateland@NateBargatze.com
